title: Heimerdingers Turrets
body: Heimerdingers turrets are glitching out and shooting even thought heimerdinger is nowhere near them

replies.body: I was in a game yesterday as Gragas, I ganked Heimerdinger top, after I left, one of his turrets in lane wouldn't stop shooting me no matter how far away I was. It didn't do damage and stopped after the turret was destroyed eventually, but he is definitely bugged at the moment.
Thats not a glitch, they stay active for a short amount of time after heimer leaves the area.

No, this is a serious glitch. They stay for a long amount of time and seem to gain faster attack speed. Please note that not all of us have been experiencing this bug but we still need to solve it!
King regards
~Sebhem
